title: Junior Bookkeeper Needed FULLY REMOTE - FULL TIME
job_overview:
**This is a full-time role. Candidates must be able to commit exclusively to this position once hired.**

We’re super excited to announce that LedgerWay, a licensed USA CPA firm, is growing again - and we’re on the lookout for our next amazing Junior Bookkeeper!

What’s in it for you…
You’ll be joining a team of high-performing, kind, and driven professionals who genuinely love what they do. LedgerWay isn’t your typical accounting firm - we’re people-first, growth-focused, and all about helping our team thrive.

Here’s what’s waiting for you:
- A dynamic, friendly, and fun remote team
- Supportive leadership who actually listens
- The chance to do meaningful work with US-based clients
- Long-term stability (our Accounting Manager has been with us since 2013!)
- Empowerment to make decisions and take ownership
- Mentorship and company-paid courses to level up your skills
- Career path opportunities (Accounting Supervisor? FP&A? CFO? All possible!)
- A workplace that respects your time, your energy, and your life

If you’ve been searching for more than just a job, this is your sign!

What a career here looks like…
At LedgerWay, we toss out the usual corporate hierarchy mindset. You won’t be stuck in a sea of red tape or micromanagement. Instead, you’ll find a workplace that values open communication, professional maturity, and your unique contribution.

This isn’t just about numbers - it’s about making a difference in the lives of small, medium, and large business owners. Every transaction you reconcile and every invoice you manage adds real value. You’re not just balancing books; you’re helping real people succeed.

We’ve got your back. You’ll receive training, ongoing support, and opportunities to evolve. You’ll never feel like just another employee here - you’ll be seen, heard, and celebrated.

What’s needed from you…
To help us continue delivering top-tier service to our US-based clients, we need your bookkeeping expertise and proactive energy. You’ll be part of a supportive team but also expected to own your role like the professional you are.

Oh, and one more thing:
To apply, please write “Sunshine fuels my focus” at the top of your cover letter.

What you’ll be in charge of…
- Daily bookkeeping for multiple U.S. clients
- Data entry and transaction recording
- Bank and credit card reconciliations
- Accounts Payable and Receivable support
- Month-end close processes
- Loan tracking
- Assisting with onboarding new clients
- Advising on past-due invoice collections
- Working exclusively with QuickBooks Online
- Collaborating with other awesome teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
- Helping us keep things organized, accurate, and calm under pressure


If you’re detail-oriented, reliable, and love the idea of handling multiple clients in different industries, this might be your dream job.

How will your life be different at LedgerWay…
Picture this: a remote-first environment that respects your time, prioritizes your growth, and surrounds you with a genuinely kind team. You’ll work independently but never alone.

We don’t do micromanagement - we hire professionals and trust them to deliver. You’ll communicate like a pro, hit your deadlines, and manage your work with confidence. And yes, we only hire team players who bring positive energy to the group. (We strictly follow a “no jerks” policy.)

This is where smart, ethical, reliable people thrive.

About you…
If you’re friendly, curious, detail-loving, and a bit of a tech nerd - we want to meet you.
- You’ve got at least 2 years of experience at a US-based CPA firm
- You’re fluent in English - written and spoken
- You’re solid in QuickBooks Online (or ready to get certified fast)
- You’re confident with tools like MS Outlook, Excel, Word
- Bonus points if you’ve worked with Upgrade to see actual info, Gusto, Stripe, Shopify, Amazon FBA, or A2X
- You’re naturally professional and dependable - you take ownership of your work
- You’re comfortable working with confidential information in a private setup
- You have a backup power solution and a stable 100/10 Mbps internet connection
- You love learning and want to grow into more advanced roles down the line

If that’s you, we’d love to chat!

Pay and benefits…
Starting at Php 55,000/month (Tell us if you bring more value!)
Annual reviews + performance-based raises
15 days PTO accrued annually
9 paid U.S. holidays
Company-provided laptop, headset, and HD camera


Work hours…
Full time (40 hours/week)
Initial 6 months: 9AM–4PM CST to sync with the team
After training: flexible schedule options with management approval

How to apply…
Send a short and genuine cover letter to Upgrade to see actual info you're eager to make a meaningful impact and grow your career with a team that truly cares - LedgerWay is waiting.

Let’s build something amazing together!


Lauren M.
LedgerWay
